full_summary:
### Temporary Help Services - Technical Writer

#### Notice Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-9255-62241281
* **Solicitation Number**: S4281174
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Published Date**: 2023-09-19
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-26T15:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-09-26

#### Service Requirements

The Department of National Defense seeks Temporary Help Services for a Technical Writer position. The requirement is under the Procurement Strategy and Delivery Division of PSPC.

#### Solicitation Details

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement held by suppliers under EN578-172870 who qualified under the streams and categories: 10.6 Technical Writer.

The following Supply Arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* A Hundred Answers Inc.
* Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
* BP & M Government IM & IT Consulting Inc.
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* Contract Community Inc.
* Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
* DLS Technology Corporation
* Portage Personnel Inc.
* Spearhead Management Canada Ltd.
* Star-Ting Incorporated
* TAG HR The Associates Group Inc.
* TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc. (Joint Venture)
* The Halifax Computer Consulting Group Inc.
* The Right Door Consulting & Solutions Incorporated
* Thinkpoint Inc.

The Technical Writer will be responsible for providing technical writing services to the Department of National Defense.

#### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defense
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1
* **Contracting Entity Country**: Canada
* **End User Entities**: None

#### Proposal Submission

The proposal submission deadline is September 26, 2023, at 15:00 ET. Please submit your proposal through the Canada Buys portal. 

This RFP is open to the invited Supply Arrangement holders listed above. Please ensure that your proposal is submitted in accordance with the requirements outlined in the RFP document.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at (613) 971-7955 or via email at CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca. Please note that the contact information is available in both English and
